articles.author: Samuel Benson
articles.title: Capitol Police called to investigate swastika in GOP congressional office - Politico
articles.description: An American flag altered to include an image of a swastika was found in Rep. Dave Taylor’s office.
articles.content:
Taylor said he immediately directed a thorough investigation alongside the Capitol Police, adding, No further comment will be provided until it has been completed.
The flag was found inside Taylors … [+736 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s war on cartels enters new phase as experts predict what’s next - Fox News
articles.description: As Trump declares an “armed conflict" with the cartels, experts gave insight on what Americans can expect to see next in the “quasi-war" taking place at the country’s doorstep.
articles.content: As the U.S. unleashes a series of lethal strikes on cartel drug boats and President Donald Trump declared an "armed conflict" with the cartels, experts gave insight on what Americans can expect to se… [+6060 chars]
